title: WTB: T206 Walsh and Wheat- Especially rare back.
author: SethY

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Walsh and Wheat- Especially rare back.
posts.post_content:
I have a nice T206 Ed Walsh Piedmont and a Sovereign 350 incoming, and I am looking for more rare backs of Walsh.

Also, I am looking to add other Zack Wheat backs, as I currently only have a Piedmont back in my collection.

Please have pictures and prices.

Thanks a ton!

Seth
[url]seth.yarkony@gmail.com[/url]
